sentences.en: Lastly she arrived at the tresses and felt a qualm of disgust.
sentences.cn: 最后,她看到提到头发的那一句,心里觉得一阵恶心.

sentences.en: Lastly the digital signal processing block made of FPGA + DSP is presented.
sentences.cn: 最后给出了由FPGA+DSP构成的数字信号模块的实现过程.

sentences.en: Lastly, article indicates the trend of this method in water analysis.
sentences.cn: 最后指出了流动注射法在今后水质分析中的发展趋势.

sentences.en: Lastly, author points out Babylonian mathematics influence on the development of science.
sentences.cn: 最后, 作者指出了巴比伦数学对科学发展的影响.

sentences.en: Lastly, could I ask all of you to keep this information secret?
sentences.cn: 最后，我请求各位对这一消息保密。

sentences.en: Lastly, I must explain why I won't accept his offer.
sentences.cn: 最后, 我必须说明一下我何以不接受他的邀请.

sentences.en: Lastly, I must say I owe all the achievements to the encouragement and help from my collegues and friends.
sentences.cn: 最后, 我必须说我的这些成就都应归功于我的同事和朋友们的鼓励和帮助.

sentences.en: Lastly, optimal iteration algorithm was performed to reduce the registration error.
sentences.cn: 最后应用迭代算法降低配准误差.

sentences.en: Lastly, the paper simulates bolt timbering of the laneway along the gob.
sentences.cn: 最后, 分析模拟了沿空巷道的锚杆支护情况.

sentences.en: Lastly, the voters must take some of the blame.
sentences.cn: 最后, 选民也要负上一定的责任.

sentences.en: Lastly, we all get our words mixed up sometimes.
sentences.cn: 最后一点, 每个人都会有说错话的时候.

sentences.en: Lastly, we have aggregated these laws of demand and supply.
sentences.cn: 最后, 我们把需求与供给的定律综合起来.

sentences.en: Lastly, we insisted that our choices actively use their power.
sentences.cn: 最后, 我们认为他们必须积极运用权力.

sentences.en: Thank you to Jim Sheppe for drawing the maps. And lastly, a very big thank-you to Tony, William, Deborah and Bethan.
sentences.cn: 多谢詹姆·谢泼绘制的地图。最后，非常感谢托尼、威廉、德博拉和贝唐。

sentences.en: They wash their hands, arms and faces, and lastly, they wash their feet.
sentences.cn: 他们洗了手、胳膊和脸，最后脚也洗了。

sentences.en: Xin: Lastly, please close your eyes. Always remember what I look like.
sentences.cn: 心: 最后?请你闭上眼睛. 永远记住我的样子.

words.tran_cn: 最后的；最近的，最新的；仅剩的；最不可能…的
最后地；上次，最近；最后一点
末尾，最后；上个；鞋楦（做鞋的模型）

trans.tran_en: used when telling someone the last thing at the end of a list or a series of statements
